publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4861.1 Des McNulty: Scottish Road Safety Frameworkâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-4861) in the name of Stewart Stevenson, after "2020" insert "; notes the significant reductions in the numbers of children and young people killed and seriously injured in the period 1997 to 2007; calls on the Scottish Government to prioritise making streets safer for cyclists and for vulnerable groups of pedestrians such as visually impaired and partially sighted people".
